CustomField.formula: if ( not(isblank ( Opportunity__c)) , Opportunity__r.ERP_Quote_URL__c, HYPERLINK("https://www.xometry.com/staff/quotes-list/?search="+ Shadow_Xometry_ERP_ID__c +"&rowsPerPage=25&page=1&sortBy=last_updated&sortDirection=desc","Go to this Quote in the ERP", "_blank"))
CustomField.label: ERP Quote URL
